recipe_name: Chocolate cakes with chilli chocolate sauce
author: Lesley Waters
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Mix together the cake ingredients in a food processor and spoon even portions into a six-hole, non-stick muffin tin. Place in the oven and bake for 10 minutes. For the chocolate sauce, melt the chocolate and chilli flakes in a heat-proof bowl set over boiling water. To serve, turn out the cakes onto plates and dust with icing sugar. Pour the chocolate sauce over each muffin and drizzle with cream.
ingredients: 25g/1oz cocoa,  100g/3½oz self-raising flour,  100g/3½oz butter,  100g/3½oz caster sugar,  2 free-range eggs,  55g/2oz dark chocolate,  ½ tsp chilli flakes,  icing sugar,  double cream
